name: Kid Icarus™: Uprising
description: One of the most beloved franchises in Nintendo’s long history makes its glorious return in spectacular 3D! Pit of Kid Icarus fame is back in a new game designed specifically for the Nintendo 3DS system. Kid Icarus: Uprising is a fast-paced and action-packed blend of aerial and ground-based shooting featuring a huge single-player adventure as well as the option to play with friends locally and online. Please note: this software does not include the AR Cards or Nintendo 3DS stand included with the packaged version. These items are not available for individual purchase.
